review: Reordered this and finally got it.  Set it up in minutes.  Streams with no buffering and stays up to date on its own! Nice job Amazon!  I have played with Apple TV, ROKU and Chromecast, Firestick leaves them all in the dust!  Get it today! SERIOUSLY!!
author: Riga Da Mon "Riga28"

review: Not sure I see the benefit over Netflix. Movie selection is... OK. I have Comcast Xfinity cable -- which Comcast claims is running at their highest speed -- and still movies hang up with the Fire Stick. Curious, as this never happens with Netflix. Never. Unless movie selection improves and the hang-ups stop, I will be very unimpressed.

review: I was very excited when I recieved the Fire TV Stick as a gift from my wife. Ever since we joined prime, I wanted a way to enjoy the content on the big screen, this is the perfect solution at an amazing price. Terrific value. If you have Prime and adequate internet service, this is a no brainer.  The interface is smooth and easy to navigate. The iOS app works great on our iPhones and iPad, the added voice control feature is a HUGE plus. Highly recommend.
